Title: Setting the Defense
Description:
Custodian Cynegos and I were just discussing the impact the Primalist attack has had on the plans to assault the Cobalt Assembly, and I had an idea. 

<Celeste withdraws a wand from the folds of her robes.>

Take my wand and empower their weapons!

A little bit of fire should do the trick...
ObjectivesText: Empower Azure Defenders in Camp Antonidas.
RewardText:
Fantastic job! 

After repelling their attack on the camp, it's imperative that we keep the Primalists on the back foot. 

Now please give me my wand back.
